action.vampirism.awareness_hunter.desc: Action to sense nearby Vampire players or entities
action.vampirism.bat.desc: Turn into a bat and fly away
action.vampirism.dark_blood_projectile.d: Fire a blood projectile that deals damage
action.vampirism.disguise_hunter.desc: Temporarily significantly reduce your detection and visibility radius towards mobs and players.
action.vampirism.disguise_vampire.desc: Temporarily disguise as a non vampire to trick mobs and players
action.vampirism.half_invulnerable.desc: Action which blocks large damages but slows you down
action.vampirism.lord_attack_speed.desc: Increases the attack speed of nearby faction members
action.vampirism.lord_speed.desc: Increases the movement speed of nearby faction members
action.vampirism.potion_resistance_hunte: Remove certain negative potion effects applied to you
action.vampirism.regen.desc: Temporarily regenerate health faster but use more blood
action.vampirism.summon_bat.desc: Summon a bat swarm around you that blinds any player that touches it
action.vampirism.sunscreen.desc: Grants temporary immunity from direct sundamage with long cooldown.
action.vampirism.teleport.desc: Quickly teleport to the spot you are looking at
action.vampirism.vampire_rage.desc: In rage mode you are much faster and deal more damage but consume more blood
advancement.vampirism.bat.desc: Become a Bat while the Sun is down
advancement.vampirism.betrayal.desc: Kill a Hunter after becoming a Hunter yourself
advancement.vampirism.blood_cult.desc: Perform an ritual at the Altar of Infusion
advancement.vampirism.collect_blood.desc: Send your Minions to collect Blood
advancement.vampirism.collect_hunter_ite: Send your Minions to collect Hunter items
advancement.vampirism.defend_area.desc: Command your Minion to guard the area
advancement.vampirism.extra_storage.desc: Get yourself a Blood Container for all that Blood
advancement.vampirism.freeze_kill.desc: Kill a Vampire Hunter while it is frozen
advancement.vampirism.hunter_kill_mother: You've proven your mettle as a true hunter by conquering the 'Ancient Remains' and dealing a blow to vampiric power.
advancement.vampirism.jump_scare.desc: Find out how it is to be scared to death
advancement.vampirism.kill_resurrected_v: Stay dead monster. You don't belong in this world
advancement.vampirism.max_lord_hunter.de: Reach the highest Hunter Lord level
advancement.vampirism.max_lord_vampire.d: Reach the highest Vampire Lord level
advancement.vampirism.protect_lord.desc: Command your Minion to protect you
advancement.vampirism.sniped.desc: Get sniped while in Bat Mode
advancement.vampirism.stake.desc: Spear a Vampire with a Stake
advancement.vampirism.vampire_kill_mothe: You've have vanquishing the local source of power, a questionable accomplishment.
advancement.vampirism.yuck.desc: Suck Blood from an villager with poisonous blood

gui.vampirism.taskmaster.text.vampirism_:
Fellow hunter,
to support the local hunter community, there are several tasks you can complete. You will be rewarded upon completion. Please browse the available tasks and accept any you like.

Sire,
if you are willing to help the local Vampire community, there are several tasks you can complete. You will be rewarded upon completion and make yourself a name. Please browse the available tasks and accept any you like

item.minecraft.splash_potion.effect.vamp: Splash Potion of Vampire Fire Resistance

item.vampirism.crossbow_arrow_spitfire.t: Creates a alchemical fire on impact

minion_task.vampirism.collect_blood.star: I will head out and gather blood for you, Sire.
minion_task.vampirism.collect_hunter_ite: I will head out and search for resources
oil.vampirism.evasion.desc: Increases evasion chances when applied to armor
oil.vampirism.smelt.desc: Can be used on Pickaxes to auto smelt destroyed blocks

refinement.vampirism.rage_fury.desc: Rage action duration is extended by killing entities
refinement.vampirism.summon_bats.desc: Summon Bats can be used outside bat mode and the bats are targeting hostiles
refinement.vampirism.vista.desc: Higher view distance in vampire fog
skill.vampirism.advanced_biter.desc: Allows you to suck blood more efficiently and stop at the right moment
skill.vampirism.basic_alchemy.desc: Learn how to use the Alchemical Cauldron to craft awesome things.
skill.vampirism.blood_charge.desc: Sneak-right-click to recharge your blood while on the move
skill.vampirism.blood_potion_category_hi: Get a hint what your extra item might effect
skill.vampirism.blood_potion_duration.de: Your body response better to the potions which makes them operate longer
skill.vampirism.blood_potion_good_or_bad: Find out how many bad effects your blood potions have
skill.vampirism.blood_potion_identify_so: Get to know some of the effects of a blood potion
skill.vampirism.blood_potion_less_bad.de: Lower the chance of getting bad effects
skill.vampirism.blood_potion_portable_cr: Learn how to brew blood potions without a Blood Potion Table
skill.vampirism.blood_potion_table.desc: Learn how to use the Blood Potion Table to create potions from vampire blood
skill.vampirism.blood_vision.desc: Allows you to see entities through walls in the dark. Toggle with key
skill.vampirism.blood_vision_garlic.desc: Additionally identify entities with poisonous blood
skill.vampirism.concentrated_brewing.des: Learn expensive recipes to brew very strong potions
skill.vampirism.concentrated_durable_bre: Long and Strong is finally possible
skill.vampirism.crucifix_wielder.desc: Learn how to properly use a crucifix
skill.vampirism.disguise_hunter.desc: Allows you to hide from mobs and become far less visible to other players
skill.vampirism.durable_brewing.desc: Learn expensive recipes to brew very long lasting potions
skill.vampirism.enhanced_armor.desc: Unlock crafting enhanced versions of hunter armors
skill.vampirism.enhanced_blessing.desc: Your blessings may create more powerful items.
skill.vampirism.enhanced_crossbow.desc: Learn how to enhance your crossbows
skill.vampirism.enhanced_weapons.desc: Allow crafting enhanced weapons including crossbows
skill.vampirism.fledgling.desc: As a mature Vampire you cannot only choose to infect other creatures, but also turn into a bat
skill.vampirism.garlic_blood_vision.desc: Allows you to additionally detect entities with poisonous blood
skill.vampirism.garlic_diffuser.desc: Learn how to craft a garlic diffuser to keep those Vampires away.
skill.vampirism.garlic_diffuser_improved: Learn how to craft a garlic diffuser with a higher range
skill.vampirism.half_invulnerable.desc: An action that temporarily blocks high value damages but consumes blood for that
skill.vampirism.hunter_advanced_attack_s: Increase your attack speed even more
skill.vampirism.hunter_attack_speed_adva: Reduce your attack cooldown even further
skill.vampirism.hunter_minion_collect.de: Send your minions to collect resources
skill.vampirism.hunter_minion_stats_incr: Increases some stats of your minion
skill.vampirism.less_sundamage.desc: Suffer less damage from direct sunlight
skill.vampirism.minion_recovery.desc: Speeds up the time your minions need to recover
skill.vampirism.multitask_brewing.desc: Brew 5 instead of 3 potions with the potion table at once
skill.vampirism.neonatal_decrease.desc: Decreases the duration of your neonatal form
skill.vampirism.purified_garlic.desc: Purify your garlic to increase its effect. Boost your garlic diffuser with it.
skill.vampirism.stake1.desc: Instantly kill any Vampire that has below %s percent of its max health with a stake
skill.vampirism.stake2: How to Actually use a Stake
skill.vampirism.stake2.desc_all: Instantly kill any Vampire from behind with a stake as long as its max health is below %s and it cannot see you
skill.vampirism.stake2.desc_npc: Instantly kill any Vampire NPC from behind with a stake as long as its max health is below %s and it cannot see you
skill.vampirism.summon_bats.desc: Summon a lot of bats around you while in bat mode to distract enemies
skill.vampirism.sword_finisher.desc: Instantly kill any non-vampire that has below %s percent of their max health using a vampire sword
skill.vampirism.tech_weapons.desc: Learn how to build some advanced weapons
skill.vampirism.ultimate_crucifix.desc: Allows you to utilize the most holy crucifix
skill.vampirism.vampire_minion_collect.d: Send your minions to collect blood
skill.vampirism.vampire_minion_stats_inc: Increases some stats of your minion
skill.vampirism.vampire_rage.desc: An action that gives you a speed and damage boost on cost of increased blood usage
skill.vampirism.weapon_table.desc: Learn how to use the Hunter Weapon Table

vampirism.configuration.addVampireForest: Add the vampire forest biome to the overworld
vampirism.configuration.advancedMobPlaye: Render player faces on advanced hunter or vampire mobs
vampirism.configuration.allSkillsAtMaxLe: Unlimited skill points at max level
vampirism.configuration.allowVillageDest: Allow to destroy blocks in villages
vampirism.configuration.autoConvertGlass: Glass bottles are automatically converted to blood bottles when filled with blood and converted back when emptied. When disabled a blood bottles must be crafted.

vampirism.configuration.disableBloodVisi: Disable blood vision rendering regardless of is activation or unlock state
vampirism.configuration.disableFovChange: Disable the FOV change caused by the speed buf for vampire players

vampirism.configuration.enableFactionLog: Enable a custom vampirism log file that logs specific faction actions

vampirism.configuration.enableHudActionD: Render the action duration overlay on the HUD
vampirism.configuration.enableHudBatOver: Render the bat overlay on the HUD
vampirism.configuration.enableHunterTent: Generate hunter tents in the world
vampirism.configuration.enableNearbyVamp: Render the nearby vampire overlay for the vampire awareness action on the HUD
vampirism.configuration.enableRageOverla: Render the rage overlay on the HUD
vampirism.configuration.enableSunOverlay: Render the sun overlay on the HUD
vampirism.configuration.enableVillageRai: Render the village raid overlay on the HUD
vampirism.configuration.pvpOnlyBetweenFa: PvP only between factions include humans
vampirism.configuration.renderScreenOver: Render fullscreen colored HUD effects. E.g. when leveling up as vampire
vampirism.configuration.skillButtonEnabl: Add a button to the HUD to open the skill menu
vampirism.configuration.sundamageDimensi: Enforce no Sun Damage in Dimensions
vampirism.configuration.sundamageWeaknes: Minimum level for sun damage weakness
vampirism.configuration.title: Vampirism Configuration
vampirism.configuration.umbrella.tooltip: If enabled adds a craft-able umbrella that can be used to slowly walk though sunlight without taking damage
vampirism.configuration.useVanillaCampfi: Use the vanilla campfire instead of the custom vampirism campfire
vampirism.configuration.vampireEyes.tool: Render vampire eyes and fangs on faces
vampirism.configuration.vampireForestFog: Render fog in vampire biome. Might be enforced on the server
vampirism.configuration.vampireForestWei: Weight of the vampire forest biome in the terrablender world generation
